messages.monthlyIncomeInvalidRange: Monthly income must be between 0 and 1,000,000 AED
messages.financialSituationMinLength: Please provide at least 10 characters describing your financial situation
messages.financialSituationMaxLength: Description must be 1000 characters or less
messages.employmentCircumstancesMinLength: Please provide at least 10 characters describing your employment circumstances

messages.reasonForApplyingMinLength: Please provide at least 10 characters explaining your reason for applying

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Please provide your personal details. Fields marked with * are required.

familyFinancial.title: Family & Financial Information
familyFinancial.description: Please provide information about your family situation and financial circumstances. Fields marked with * are required.

dependents.label: Number of Dependents
dependents.placeholder: Enter number of dependents (0 if none)

currentFinancialSituation.label: Current Financial Situation
currentFinancialSituation.placeholder: Describe your current financial situation, income sources, expenses, debts...

employmentCircumstances.label: Employment Circumstances
employmentCircumstances.placeholder: Describe your employment status, job search activities, skills, barriers to employment...

reasonForApplying.label: Reason for Applying
reasonForApplying.placeholder: Explain why you are applying for support and how it will help improve your situation...

dialog.title: AI Writing Assistant
dialog.description: I'm here to help you write compelling and effective text. Describe what you'd like to write, and I'll craft it for you.

labels.customPrompt: What would you like me to write?
labels.customPromptPlaceholder: Describe what you want to write about...

prompts.financialSituation: Help me describe my current financial situation in one paragraph (max 300 characters). Include income, expenses, and any financial challenges I'm facing.
prompts.employmentCircumstances: Help me describe my employment circumstances in one paragraph (max 300 characters). Include job status, work experience, and any barriers I face in finding employment.
prompts.reasonForApplying: Help me explain why I need social support in one paragraph (max 300 characters). Describe how it will help improve my situation and achieve my goals.

step1.title: Personal Information
step1.description: Please provide your basic personal details including name, identification, contact information, and address.
step1.successMessage: Personal information saved successfully! Moving to next step...

step2.title: Family & Financial Information
step2.description: Please provide information about your family situation and financial circumstances.

step3.title: Situation Descriptions
step3.description: Please describe your current situation in detail. AI assistance is available to help you articulate your circumstances effectively.

summary.title: Social Support Application Complete!
summary.description: Thank you for completing your social support application. We have received your personal information, family & financial details, and situation descriptions.
summary.reviewTime: We will review your application within 2-3 business days
summary.emailConfirmation: You will receive an email confirmation shortly
summary.contactInfo: Our support team will contact you to discuss next steps
